item.title: ROIV
item.description: score:-124 Chances: Roivant Sciences Ltd. has shown significant growth and positive results in its product portfolio, indicating potential for future success in the biopharmaceutical industry. The approval of a $1.5 billion share repurchase program and the successful sale of Telavant to Roche for $7.
